entities.name: madam hooch
entities.description: Madam Hooch is still overseeing Gryﬀindor practices to keep an eye on Harry. She takes the Firebolt in her hands before takeoﬀ and gives them the beneﬁt of her professional opinion.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is being watched by Madam Hooch during Gryﬀindor practices. He is given the Firebolt to ride.

entities.name: firebolt
entities.description: The Firebolt is a new broomstick that everyone else has been impressed with. Madam Hooch takes it in her hands before takeoﬀ and gives them the beneﬁt of her professional opinion.

entities.name: gryﬀindor
entities.description: Gryﬀindor is a house that Madam Hooch is overseeing practices for. Harry is a member of this house.

relationships.description: Madam Hooch takes the Firebolt in her hands before takeoﬀ and gives them the beneﬁt of her professional opinion.
Madam Hooch is still overseeing Gryﬀindor practices to keep an eye on Harry.
